department.ch: 產業經濟研究所碩士班

goal.ch: With Python-programming skills, students will learn how to use concepts and techniques from both Data Analysis and Machine Learning algorithms for data-centric AI modeling in Business Strategies and Analyses.
goal.en: With Python-programming skills, students will learn how to use concepts and techniques from both Data Analysis and Machine Learning algorithms for data-centric AI modeling in Business Strategies and Analyses.

outline.ch:
Course Introduction
Basics of Python Data Structure
Python Data Preprocessing with Examples
Python Data Visualization with Examples
Exploratory Data Analysis – Concepts and Applications
Introduction to Machine Learning
Supervized Learning – Regression Models with Examples
Supervized Learning – Classification Models with Examples
Midterm Project (Individual)
Unsupervized Learning – Clustering ＆ Dimensionality Reduction
Feature Engineering – Feature Selection with Applications
Best-Model Selection
[Case Study 1] :  Moneyball Strategy
[Case Study 2] :  Classification Models – Mobile Phone Pricing
[Case Study 3] :  Regression Models – House Pricing
[Case Study 4] :  Stock Prediction – Time-series Forecasting
[Case Study 5] :  Netflix Recommendation System
Final Project Presentation
outline.en:
Course Introduction
Basics of Python Data Structure
Python Data Preprocessing with Examples
Python Data Visualization with Examples
Exploratory Data Analysis – Concepts and Applications
Introduction to Machine Learning
Supervized Learning – Regression Models with Examples
Supervized Learning – Classification Models with Examples
Midterm Project (Individual)
Unsupervized Learning – Clustering ＆ Dimensionality Reduction
Feature Engineering – Feature Selection with Applications
Best-Model Selection
[Case Study 1] :  Moneyball Strategy
[Case Study 2] :  Classification Models – Mobile Phone Pricing
[Case Study 3] :  Regression Models – House Pricing
[Case Study 4] :  Stock Prediction – Time-series Forecasting
[Case Study 5] :  Netflix Recommendation System
Final Project Presentation

textbook.ch: [Ref] : Jake VanderPlas, “Python Data Science Handbook — Essential Tools for Working with Data”, O‘Reilly Media, 2017. (https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/)
textbook.en: [Ref] : Jake VanderPlas, “Python Data Science Handbook — Essential Tools for Working with Data”, O‘Reilly Media, 2017. (https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/)

gradMethod.ch:
Assignment (作業)30％
Midterm Project(Individual)20％
Final Project ＆ Presentation (Group)50％
gradMethod.en:
Assignment (作業)30％
Midterm Project(Individual)20％
Final Project ＆ Presentation (Group)50％

ch.competencies: 獨立思考和解決問題能力

ch: 系所:限產業經濟研究所碩士班、產業經濟研究所博士班。
en: Department:Master of Industrial Economics、PhD in Industrial Economics only.
